SELECT USER_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_NICK, USER_SCORE, USER_PROFILE_URL FROM User WHERE 1=1
AND USER_NICK LIKE '%${search}%'
AND USER_ID LIKE '%${search}%'
AND USER_DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY USER_SCORE DESC LIMIT #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM User WHERE 1=1
AND USER_NICK LIKE '%${search}%'
AND USER_ID LIKE '%${search}%'
AND USER_DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_PUBLIC_YN = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM User WHERE 1=1 AND USER_DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY USER_SCORE DESC LIMIT 0,4
